transcript.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.
Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of pretty good AI. Am I speaking with Felix?
Yes, that's me.
Got it. Can you please provide your date of birth?
Got It Felix? How may I help you today?
I would like to book a checkup for next Thursday morning.
Caught it just to confirm by checkup. Do you mean a follow-up consultation? A new patient consultation, a procedure or a physical therapy session
I mean a new patient consultation.
Understand. You like to book a new patient consultation for next Thursday morning.
Before we continue, does your office accept Cigna insurance?
I don't have access to insurance plan details.
Can I book the appointment anyway?
Yes, you can still book the appointment.
I would like to book a new patient consultation for next Thursday morning.
The next available. New. Patient consultation for Thursday morning is March 5th at 9:00 a.m. with Dr. Adam Bricker, would you like to book this time?
I asked for next Thursday morning, not March 5th.
You're right, Felix. Next Thursday is February 26th but there are no available new patient consultations that morning.
Can you check again for any availability later that day?
Let me check for any available. New patient. Consultations later on Thursday, February 26th.
Okay, I'll wait.
There are no available new patient consultations for Thursday, February 26th, either morning or later. In the day, the next available Thursday is March 5th with time at 9:00.
Okay, thank you.
